channel.title: ZodiacsReign Pack V.12: Back To The Basics [18,800 Downloads]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/VErJe.png[/img] [b][size=8pt] ZodiacsReign was made to assist people who want to create a private server or to help people who need more help with their current server issues, the pack includes ID list's, common tools and a few server sources. ZodiacsReign packs have been around since 2008, becoming a utility in 2010 and returning to traditional packs in 2012.[/size][/center]
[ul][li]614-632 Lists Added[/li] [li]More Tools and More Organized Folders[/li][/ul]
[center] [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/zodiacsreign][IMG]http://hqdesktopwallpapers.us/images/download_button.png[/img][/URL]
Also support Mendorphins, another great pack-maker whose packs are inspired by my own. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,516112.0.html
[center] [size=23pt]Credits[/size] Z 0 D I A C/ZodiacsReign All that contributed
[center][size=18pt]Quotes[/size] [b]Lin[/b] : Nice job. Why don't you work on a server though? The packages out there aren't going to get any better than this to be honest.
[b]Galkon[/b] : Great job, I'll definitely use tools in this.
[b] Hidendra[/b] : DON'T WORRY THERE'S NO VIRUSES EVERYONE, SO DON'T ASK FOR TWO FUCKING VIRUS SCANS or i will kill you
[b]Cocoa[/b] : I already have this one on my computer, This is the best pack yet imo.
[b]Nour[/b] : Looks worthwhile and from the looks is everything you promised, keep it up, it's nice to have everything in one package.
[center][i]ZodiacsReign 12.0 Utility was made by Z 0 D I A C of Moparscape/R-S Forums & Released on March 11, 2012
